description1: Implemented authentication by firebase and authorization by JSON web token. and without authentication & authorization users are not eligible to have access.
description2: Created dashboard for admin and users. So they have some activities here like seeing orders, paying for their orders, updating their profile, etc.
description3: Some activities for admin manage product adds a new product, make admin someone, Utilized stripe for payment method and nodeMailer, mail Gun to send mail
technology: React, React-Bootstrap, Node, MongoDB, Express, JSON web token, Firebase, Dot env, React-Router, React-from-hooks
